ecu_name.description: Name of the ECU. Max 20 characters

dtcs.description: List of Diagnostic Trouble Codes. The list can contain Max 255 DTCs

obd_broadcast_address.description: 11-Bit broadcast address the ECU uses to receive OBD requests (functional addressing). The target address is: obd_ecu_address + 0x8

obd_ecu_address.description: 11-Bit physical address the ECU uses to response to an OBD request. The target address is: obd_ecu_address + 0x8

uds_ecu_address.description: 11-Bit physical address the ECU uses to receive and response to an UDS request (physical addressing). The target address is: uds_ecu_address + 0x8. The UDS module does not use functional addressing

can_interface.description: CAN Interface used by the ECU simulator
